page.title: 17Local Industry Whiteparish
page.content: Basically Whiteparish is a rural area, but there are some small businesses which are worth noting. The oldest is the{saddler's - see page 6 for details {The car body repair shop}has been extensively updated just this year. It now has a low bake oven using Acrylic paints & resprays are done in about half the time previously taken. The paint mixing plant itself cost about Â£4000, so this represented a major outlay for the two man business. {Lascar Electronics}assembles small components to produce Digital Panel Instruments for electronics engineers. 18 people are employed by this firm which came to the village in January 1983. The site was used for many years as a Wilts. County Council Central Kitchen for schools in the area, although Whiteparish school has always had its own kitchen.
